title: Ticket #6487: Detect expired remote certificates
description:
From https://jira.opensciencegrid.org/browse/SOFTWARE-2741:

Jaime Frey - the basic idea here was that the client has a copy of the remote host (public) certificate as part of the authentication. When the Globus auth fails here:

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/blob/master/src/condor_io/condor_auth_x509.cpp#L799

could we extract the peer credential as we do here:

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/blob/master/src/condor_io/condor_auth_x509.cpp#L861

and examine it for expiration?
